page.title: 18A Mother's Day - Leck area
page.content: Alarm wakes us at 6.10,a signal for Peter to get up and milk the cows. I get up at 7 and the children leave for school in the taxi at 8.30. Peter returns for breakfast at 9.00.I wash up,do two loads of washing and hang it out,feed the cats,and clean up. After coffee I go into Kendal for groceries. The children are staying late at school for evening activities so I need to pick them up at 4.30. Just about to set off for school when the fish man arrives and I get some plaice for supper. Return home,put shopping away,get washing in, get Edward ready for cubs and take him with friends to Ingleton. Return home, make supper and dash out to flower arranging demon- stration at W.I. I pass Peter on the doorstep. Arrive home at 10.00 after calling on a villager about Parish Council business.In bed by 11.30.
